JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities   Design and develop mission critical applications developed using AngularJS, .Net / C#, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Web API etc.   Understand the data modular   and its mapping to the various business processes.   Develop high usability web interfaces to manage complex interactions with non - technical users.   Work in all stages of website development and maintenance  -  from conception and design through testing and deployment.   Create a simple, well - documented code to solve complex business problems.   Work closely with other team members, project managers, and customer to ensure that all requirements are met and work as per specification.
